# Financially Sovereign Academy
> Master money. Master life. Free financial literacy for everyone.

## About This Site
Financially Sovereign Academy is a free, interactive financial education platform teaching the 10 fundamentals everyone needs to achieve financial independence. No credit card, no signup required.

## Learning Paths
- **Personalized Assessment Path**: 2-minute assessment creates custom learning path based on individual financial situation
- **Full Curriculum Path**: Self-paced journey through all 10 core modules

## Core Modules (10 Fundamentals)
1. Money Mindset & Cash Flow - Understanding your relationship with money
2. Emergency Funds & Saving - Building financial security buffers
3. Banking Without Getting Robbed - Strategic use of financial institutions
4. Credit Scores Decoded - Building and maintaining excellent credit
5. Debt Strategy - Understanding debt costs and strategic use
6. Taxes & Paychecks Demystified - Tax system navigation and optimization
7. Investing for Humans - Long-term wealth building through compound growth
8. Protect What You've Built - Risk management and insurance
9. Don't Get Scammed - Consumer protection and smart decisions
10. Your Financial Master Plan - Integrating everything into a life plan

## Interactive Tools
- Compound Growth Calculator
- Debt Payoff Calculator

- budgeting, saving, emergency funds

## Target Audience
- Complete beginners to finance
- Anyone wanting to understand money basics
- People seeking to become financially independent
- Those tired of paying 1-2% AUM to financial advisors

## Content Philosophy
- No jargon - plain English explanations
- Honest about trade-offs - pros and cons of everything
- Real scenarios - learn from practical examples
- Interactive - calculators, simulations, not just lectures
- Free forever - financial literacy should be accessible
